Compilation Instruction

"make" will compile my_prog.c into ass1 executable.

To execute ass1 executable of my_prog.c enter either -n x,-h or -p as command line arguments.
Example:
./ass1 -h
./ass1 -p
./ass1 -n 4

"make clean" will remove the ass1 generated file.

Version Control: RCS; use the command vi  rlog file to view the rlog of my_prog.c
Comments:Programs in this folder programs has good performance and has no issues.

Project Description: my_prog uses getopt & perror options
~
